argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsuminv.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsuminv.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsuminv.p | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsuminv.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptfidminv.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptfidminv.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsummptfidminv.f | |- F = ( x e. A |-> C ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` G ) e. _V |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> .0. e. _V ) |
| 12 | 7, 5, 6, 11 | #P_fsuppmptdm | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 12 | #P_gsuminv | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) |
